label: prohibition_of_use_of_hazardous_chemicals_as_defined_by_the_pan_international_list_of_highly_hazardous_pesticides
comment: Restrictions or prohibitions in place on the use of hazardous chemicals (as defined by the PAN International List of Highly Hazardous Pesticides)Does the standard restrict or prohibit the use of hazardous chemicals as defined by the PAN International List of Highly Hazardous Pesticides?
